#Newline SHUTUP#Newline #Newline #Newline
  • Fine! Be like that then.
    • #Newline
  • Ok#Comma I'll stop talking now.
    • #Newline
  • I won't talk to you then if that's what you want.
    • #Newline
  • Why did you come if you don't want me to talk? Ok#Comma I will shut up.
    • #Newline
